review: Dr. Anubha is extremely particular with the treatments. She clearly lays out all the facts beforehand. It was great as always to get treated by her

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Abubha Jain is a thorough professional.  She made me feel comfortable, and settled me in at first.  She explained what she was going to do, each time.  Her diagnosis of the problem was quick.  She suggested an effective remedy and saw through the implementation efficiently.  I had minimal pain and was very happy with her treating me.  I would highly recommend Opus Dental and Dr Anubha.
